About Me

Let me tell you about myself what I do...

Background

Hi there! My name is Konstantin and I am self taught Junior Web Developer. I have always been in love with technologies and its processes, particularly how things interact with each other. Thus, I have discovered Frontend Development for myself. My goal is to become Full Stack Web Developer and also to get deeper into Backend Side. If talking about myself, I'm result oriented person who loves to code and not afraid of barriers. I do also like to read books, listen to classic music and go for a walk. Please do not hesitate to contact me via Form I'd love to talk to you!
